app.model.ArticlePage.title: Change user password in Ubuntu

app.model.QuestionPage.author: Justin Smith
app.model.QuestionPage.title: How to change desktop background in Gnome?
app.model.QuestionPage.content: How do I change the background image of the desktop in Gnome?

app.model.QuestionComment.author: Miky Mouse
app.model.QuestionComment.content: I don't know, don't ask me!

app.model.QuestionPage.author: Eric Tellmore
app.model.QuestionPage.title: How can I start a service?
app.model.QuestionPage.content: I want to start the apache service on a Fedora Core distribution. How can I do that?

app.model.QuestionComment.author: Miky Mouse
app.model.QuestionComment.content: Just use the command: service apache2 start

app.model.QuestionComment.author: Apple Man
app.model.QuestionComment.content: You can also use the inet.d commands.
